name: File Upload
description: Component for uploading files via drag and drop or click.

properties.name: accept
properties.label: Accepted Files
properties.description: Comma-separated list of accepted file types (e.g. .png, .jpg)

properties.name: uploadLabel
properties.label: Upload Label
properties.description: Text to display on the upload button

properties.name: removeAllLabel
properties.label: Remove All Label
properties.description: Text to display on the remove all button

properties.name: clickLabel
properties.label: Click Label
properties.description: Text for the clickable part of the drop zone

properties.name: dragDropLabel
properties.label: Drag Drop Label
properties.description: Text for the drag and drop part of the drop zone

events.name: fileSelected
events.label: File Selected
events.payloadDescription: Array of currently selected File objects

events.name: upload
events.label: Upload Clicked
events.payloadDescription: Array of files to be uploaded

events.name: fileDeleted
events.label: File Deleted
events.payloadDescription: Single File object that was removed

events.name: filesCleared
events.label: Files Cleared
events.payloadDescription: Array of all files that were cleared

examples.title: Single File Upload
examples.description: Basic usage for single file upload.

examples.title: Multiple File Upload
examples.description: Allow selecting multiple files at once.
